review: I am not happy with my player.  The screen flickers and fails often... resulting in several times where I had to unplug and restart it.  It eventually returns to it's normal flickering self.  My ROKU has no such struggles.
author: Bryan L Walker

review: I could see this being excellent for the office or a professional setting. I have a few friends that use this in their offices and it streamlines everything. I used this at home. Wasn't great. Didn't hold a candle to Roku or any other streaming devices like Xbox. I bought it to try it out. It didn't do better than my original roku so I returned it. Google will make this product better, I know it. But right now it isn't quite there with the rest of the market.
author: Zach

review: It was difficult to install, only a few available apps to display content you can already send with other devices much better. You have to use google chrome web browser.

review: Easy set-up, works well but also crashes often.  Improve reliability of software and this will be big hit among consumers

review: I just purchased this item a couple of weeks ago and I love it.  I am able to stream more things to my big screen TV using it.  The only problem I have noticed; (and it may be more on my end, not really sure yet), is that when streaming music, there are occasional gaps in the song being streamed.  May also be a way to deter anyone from wanting to copy the music; I don't know.

author: BykJnky

review: I love my chromecast. It was easy to install on my tv and set up. It plays movies on my TV and for the first time I can relax in my bedroom and watch things. However, the device only allows Netflix, HBO Go, Hulu, Pandora, Youtube and I can play all my pictures and movies on the TV. I am VERY DISAPPOINTED that I cannot play my Amazon Prime movies. I really don't understand this. I am paying to get Prime and part of the reason was to watch their movies. I will take this into account when it comes time to renew Prime, especially since Prime membership is going up in price.
author: M. Hartman
